title: Notebook kernel becomes unresponsive during long operations
body: When running cells with long-running operations (like training ML models), the notebook kernel becomes completely unresponsive. Cannot interrupt execution or run other cells.

comments.body: We're investigating this. It seems to be related to the GIL and how we handle kernel communication.
This is blocking my research workflow. Any workarounds available?
Working on a fix that implements async kernel communication. Should resolve the GIL blocking issue.

cross_references.title: Cell execution fails with undefined variable error

subject: notebook_execution
